com.sudoplay.axion

Class Axion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sudoplay.axion.Axion

  • public class Axion
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class for Axion, a tool for working with NBT.
    Author:
    Jason Taylor

    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        public static Axion createInstance(java.lang.String newName)
                            throws AxionInstanceException
        Create a new configuration with the given name. If a configuration already exists with the name provided, an exception is thrown.

        This new configuration will not have a base tag or any other tags registered.

        Parameters:
        newName - name of the new configuration
        Returns:
        a new configuration
        Throws:
        AxionInstanceException

      • createInstanceFrom

        public static Axion createInstanceFrom(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String newName)
                                throws AxionInstanceException
        Create a new configuration by duplicating the configuration named with the new name given. If a configuration already exists with the name provided, an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the configuration to duplicate
        newName - name of the new configuration
        Returns:
        a new configuration
        Throws:
        AxionInstanceException

        Parameters:

      • lock

        public Axion lock()
        Changes protection mode to Locked. Any attempt to change the configuration while it is locked will result in an exception. Use unlock() to unlock.

        Can't use when Immutable.

        Returns:
        this Axion instance
        See Also:
        unlock(), setImmutable()

      • unlock

        public Axion unlock()
        Changes protection mode to Unlocked.

        Can't use when Immutable.

        Returns:
        this Axion instance
        See Also:
        lock(), setImmutable()

      • setImmutable

        public Axion setImmutable()
        Changes protection mode to Immutable. Once this mode is set, it can't be undone.
        Returns:
        this Axion instance
        See Also:
        lock(), unlock()

        public int getIdFor(java.lang.Class<? extends Tag> tagClass)
             throws AxionTagRegistrationException

        If no id is found, an exception is thrown.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • registerTag

        public <T extends Tag,V> Axion registerTag(int id,
                                  java.lang.Class<T> tagClass,
                                  java.lang.Class<V> type,
                                  TagAdapter<T> adapter,
                                  TagConverter<T,V> converter)
                  throws AxionTagRegistrationException,
                         AxionInstanceException
        Registers the relationships for a tag.

        Can't use when Locked or Immutable.

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the tag
        tagClass - the class of the tag
        type - the class of the type
        adapter - TagAdapter for the tag
        converter - TagConverter for the tag
        Returns:
        this Axion instance
        Throws:
        AxionTagRegistrationException
        AxionInstanceException
        See Also:

                                     throws AxionTagRegistrationException

        the base TagAdapter

      • convertToValue

        public <T extends Tag,V> V convertToValue(T tag)
                 throws AxionTagRegistrationException
        Converts the given tag into its value using the TagConverter registered for the tag's class.

        If no converter is found, an exception is thrown.

        Parameters:
        tag - tag to convert
        Returns:
        the tag's converted value
        Throws:
        AxionTagRegistrationException

      • convertToTag

        public <T extends Tag,V> T convertToTag(java.lang.String name,
                               V value)
                           throws AxionTagRegistrationException
        Converts the given value into its tag using the converter registered for the value's class.

        If no converter is found, an exception is thrown.

        Parameters:
        name - name of the new tag
        value - value to convert
        Returns:
        the value's converted tag
        Throws:
        AxionTagRegistrationException

      • createObjectFrom

        public <T extends Tag,O> O createObjectFrom(T tag,
                                   java.lang.Class<O> type)
                   throws AxionMapperRegistrationException
        Creates an object from a tag using the NBTObjectMapper registered for the class given as type.

        If no mapper is found, an exception is thrown.

        Parameters:
        tag - tag to create the object from
        type - class used to lookup registered mapper
        Returns:
        a new object mapped from the tag given
        Throws:
        AxionMapperRegistrationException

        Parameters:

        object - object to convert
        Returns:
        a new tag mapped from the object given
